org.apache.mahout.h2obindings

Class H2OBlockMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.math.AbstractMatrix
      • org.apache.mahout.h2obindings.H2OBlockMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<MatrixSlice>, Matrix, VectorIterable

    public class H2OBlockMatrix
extends AbstractMatrix
    A Matrix implementation to represent a vertical Block of DRM. Creation of the matrix is an O(1) operation with negligible overhead, and will remain so as long as the matrix is only read from (no modifications). On the first modification, create a copy on write Matrix and all further operations happen on this cow matrix. The benefit is, mapBlock() closures which never modify the input matrix save on the copy overhead.
